title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 43-3.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 43-3.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Subpart is to conserve the surf clam
resource and prevent an increase in fishing effort directed toward surf clams
in the Atlantic Ocean by establishing a limit on the entry of additional
vessels into the fishery until such time as a surf clam management plan is
adopted pursuant to section
13-0308
of the Environmental

Conservation Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
43-3.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
